EmailTemplate.description: Used for State License Registration process if due date is 60 days
EmailTemplate.name: Pending Submission Date
EmailTemplate.subject: Pending Submission Date : Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} -{!Case.State__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please note that the license for this case # {!Case.CaseNumber}, State -{!Case.State__c} is due in 60 days. Coordinator please take ownership of case accordingly
Thank you !
{!Case.Thread_Id}
